comments.body: We should probably check `seconds`. `nanos` will be empty if you simply select `30.seconds`.

As far as I understood this test, it used the LET as a kind of index (retry number `i` had `LET=i`). I have switched to using `deduplicationTime` instead, and to using nanos instead of seconds in order to not create large timeouts.

The deduplication time is initialized with `com.google.protobuf.duration.Duration.of(120, 0)`
How does this even work? I don't see a `CompletionResponse.unapply` method.
Oh, my bad, it's not part of the `case`. I misunderstood.
